name: Key Lime Rum Cake
author: GMUCHEFWHIT
summary: This Key lime-infused rum cake is a moist and delicious treat!
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan
Stir the flour and baking powder together in a mixing bowl
Cream the shortening with 1 cup butter and 2 cups sugar in a large mixing bowl until light colored and fluffy
Beat in the eggs, one at a time until mixture is light colored
Stir in 2 tablespoons rum, 2 teaspoons Key lime juice, Key lime zest, and vanilla extract until thoroughly blended
Stir in the flour mixture alternating with the milk
Pour the batter into the prepared pan
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 90 minutes
Meanwhile, make the glaze by creaming 1/4 cup sugar with 1/4 cup butter in a small saucepan until light colored and fluffy
Stir in 2 tablespoons Key lime juice until evenly blended
Bring to a boil, stirring constantly
Remove from the heat and stir in 3 tablespoons rum
Cool the cake in its pan for 10 minutes
Turn out onto a wire rack or serving plate
While the cake is still warm, use a toothpick to prick the top in many places
Pour the glaze evenly over the top of the cake so it drizzles down all sides
Cool the cake completely before serving
